value: Social graphs for over 700 movies from the moviegalaxies.com website. Each node represents a character in a movie and each edge is a same-scene appearance between two characters in that movie. The weight gives the number of same-scene appearances. Networks are extracted from movie scripts automatically.
['J. Kaminski et al., \Moviegalaxies - Social Networks in Movies.\" https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/T4HBA3
